attributes.action: Ban HGVs from lane 2 on motorways
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To reduce congestion on 3 lane motorways and dual carriageways I respectfully ask that all 7.5t and above HGVs be be limited to the inside lane only along with PSVs.

This happens in some european countries where congestion is alleviated more.
As it stands we only have single track roads for cars due to wagons slowly overtaking each other. ie: 5  miles to overtake

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
